req.name: image
req.description: Image file to upload (jpeg, jpg, png, or webp).

req.name: keyword
req.description: Keyword to filter products by name

403.description: Not authorized, admin or insufficient permissions

req.name: user
req.description: Payload for registering a new user

req.name: Cookie
req.description: JWT token stored in a cookie named 'jwt' (used for authenticating the request).

400.description: Bad request (payment not verified, transaction reused, or incorrect amount paid)
